alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Beaver; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 6:36AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER... WASHINGTON...SOUTHERN ALLEGHENY...SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND... FAYETTE...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 635 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was located near West Newton, or 7 miles south of McKeesport, moving southeast at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Moon Township, McMurray, Weirton, McKeesport, Washington, Uniontown, Canonsburg, Connellsville, Avella, Gastonville, West Mifflin, Baldwin, Upper St. Clair, Scott Township, Whitehall, South Park Township, and Robinson Township. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 55. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 27 and 63. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 47 and 69. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Beaver; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Washington; Westmoreland
